mapper.select: SELECT * FROM JOURNAL WHERE SLIP_APPROVAL_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
mapper.update: UPDATE JOURNAL SET JOURNAL_NO = #{journalNo}, SLIP_NO = #{slipNo}, BALANCE_DIVISION = #{balanceDivision}, ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE = #{accountInnerCode}, ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName}, SUMMARY_NUMBER = #{summaryNumber}, SUMMARY_COMMENT = #{summaryComment}, CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode}, CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName}, LEFT_DEBTOR_PRICE = #{leftDebtorPrice}, RIGHT_CREDITS_PRICE = #{rightCreditsPrice}, JOURNAL_DESCRIPTION = #{journalDescription}, SLIP_APPROVAL_DATE = #{slipApprovalDate}, PRICE = #{price} WHERE JOURNAL_NO = #{journalNo}
mapper.select: SELECT a.ACCOUNT_CODE as ACCOUNT_CODE , a.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE as ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE , b.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_NAME as ACCOUNT_CONTROL_NAME , b.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_TYPE as ACCOUNT_CONTROL_TYPE FROM ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE a,ACCOUNT_CONTROL_DETAIL b WHERE a.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE=B.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE AND a.ACCOUNT_CODE=#{accountCode} ORDER BY ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE
mapper.update: UPDATE JOURNAL_DETAIL SET JOURNAL_DETAIL_NO=#{journaldetailNo}, JOURNAL_NO=#{journalNo}, ITEM=#{item}, VALUE=#{value}, ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE=#{accountInnerCode} WHERE JOURNAL_DETAIL_NO = #{journaldetailNo}
